headline: Why Analysts See Simon Property Group (SPG) Story Shifting After New Deals And 2026 Outlook
summary: The latest update on Simon Property Group’s stock narrative centers on a slightly higher modeled fair value, now set at about US$200.05 instead of US$197.15, alongside a marginally higher discount rate of roughly 7.81% and a revised revenue growth assumption of about 1.90%. These tweaks reflect how recent research is balancing more active interest in Simon, fresh 2026 REIT coverage, and mixed views on how much investors may pay for future cash flows. To keep on top of these shifting...

headline: From AI Darlings To Dow Dinosaurs: Investors Flee Software For Old-Economy Stocks
summary: Software stocks are sliding as AI disruption fears grow, but investors aren't panicking. Goldman Sachs shows capital rotating toward AI-insulated, real-economy sectors.
